page.title: 01The County Primary School
page.content: Headmaster... Mr. Colin Bell 264 pupils in 9 classes.. 9 teachers Caretaker.. George Hill.. comes from Liverpool and is a keen supporter of Everton Football Club. There is a secretary and two classroom assistants. 2 full time canteen staff,Mrs.Mott in charge. Several women employed part- time in serving and supervising lunch. Two classrooms built in 1874 are still in use, the rest of the buildings were built within the last 20 years. They are all in need of redecoration. There is a school hall and a gymnasium. The school day extends from 0900-1200 and 1315-1515.
